ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا لَقِيتُمْ فِئَةً فَٱثْبُتُوا۟ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You who have iman! when you meet a troop, stand firm and remember Allah repeatedly so that hopefully you will be successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O believers, when you meet an army, stand firm, and think of God a great deal that you may be blessed with success.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Believers! When you encounter a host in battle, stand firm and remember Allah much that you may triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Believers, stand firm when you meet a band of your enemy and remember God often so that you may have everlasting happiness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O People who Believe! When you meet an army, hold firm and remember Allah profusely, in order that you succeed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O you who believe! When you meet (an enemy) force, take a firm stand against them and remember Allah much, so that you may be successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O you who believe! when you meet a party, then be firm, and remember Allah much, that you may be successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O believers, whensoever you encounter a host, then stand firm, and remember God frequently; haply so you will prosper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O ye who believe! When ye meet an army, hold firm and think of Allah much, that ye may be successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Believers! When you encounter a party, remain firm and remember God much, so that you may succeed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O Ye who believe! when ye meet a party, stand firm and remember Allah much, that haply ye may fare well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O you who have faith! When you meet a host [in battle], then stand firm, and remember Allah greatly so that you may be felicitous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O ye who believe! When ye meet a force, be firm, and call Allah in remembrance much (and often); that ye may prosper:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O you who believe! When you meet (an enemy) force, take a firm stand against them and remember the Name of Allah much (both with tongue and mind), so that you may be successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Believers, when you meet an army stand firm and remember Allah abundantly, in order that you are prosperous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O you who believe! When you meet a force, stand firm, and remember God much, so that you may prevail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O you who have believed, when you encounter a company [from the enemy forces], stand firm and remember Allah much that you may be successful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [8:45] O you who believe, when you meet a host, a group of disbelievers, then stand firm, to fight them and do not [flee in] retreat, and remember God much, call upon Him for victory, that you may succeed, [that you may] triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 ye who believe!) He means the Companions of Muhammad (pbuh) (When you meet an army) a group of the disbelievers on the Day of Badr, (hold firm) along with your prophet in war (and think of Allah much) in your hearts and with your tongues, saying: "there is no deity except Allah", and "Allah is the greatest", (that ye may be successful) that you may be safe from Allah's wrath and punishment and be assisted.
